mapper.select: select lo.oid as oId, lo.order_code as orderCode, lo.open_id as openId, lo.receive_id AS receiveId, lu.user_name as userName, lu.cell_number as cellNumber, lo.admin_id AS adminId, lu2.user_name as adminName, lo.check_id as checkId, lu3.user_name as checkName, lu3.cell_number as checkNumber, lo.address_id AS addressId, la.area_name as areaName, la.city_name as cityName, la.province_name as provinceName, la.addressee as addressee, la.address as address, la.addressee_tel as addresseeTel, lo.appointment_time AS appointmentTime, lo.is_account AS isAccount, lo.price_evaluation AS priceEvaluation, lo.is_deleted AS isDeleted, lo.order_send_time AS orderSendTime, lo.order_get_time AS orderGetTime, lo.order_finish_time AS orderFinishTime, lo.create_user_id AS createUserId, lo.modify_user_id AS modifyUserId, lo.order_create_time as orderCreateTime, lo.deduct_money as deductMoney, lo.deduct_msg as deductmsg, lo.all_price as allPrice, lo.order_state as orderState, lo.sp_state as spState, lo.individual_or_merchant as individualOrMerchant, lo.order_type as orderType from lp_garbage_bag lgb left join lp_order lo on lo.oid=lgb.oid left join lp_user lu on lo.receive_id=lu.uid left join lp_user lu2 on lo.admin_id=lu2.uid left join lp_user lu3 on lo.check_id=lu3.uid left join lp_role lr on lo.open_id=lr.open_id left join lp_address la on lo.address_id=la.aid left join lp_equipment le on le.eid=lo.eid where 1=1 AND lgb.bag_code = #{bagCode}
